00033 template <typename ValueType>
00034 class CQueueObserver;

00049 template <typename ValueType>
00050 class CQueueEvent
00051 {
00052 public:
00054     typedef std::vector<ValueType> ValueList;
00055 
00060     enum Type {
00062         STARTING,
00064         STOPPING,
00066         INSERTED,
00068         REMOVED,
00070         CHANGED,
00072         CLEARED,
00074         INITIAL
00075     };
00076 
00077     
00081     CQueueEvent( Type event );
00082     
00083     
00089     CQueueEvent( Type event, const ValueList* list );
00090 
00091 
00095     CQueueEvent( Type event, const ValueType& value );
00096 
00097 
00101     Type GetEvent() const {
00102         return m_type;
00103     }
00104 
00108     size_t GetCount() const;
00109 
00113     ValueType GetValue( size_t i ) const;
00114     
00115     
00116 private:
00118     const ValueList* m_list;
00120     const ValueType* m_value;
00122     Type m_type;
00123 };

00146 template <typename ValueType>
00147 class CObservableQueue : public CObservable< CQueueEvent<ValueType> >
00148 {
00149 public:
00155     virtual ~CObservableQueue();
00156     
00157 protected:
00158     typedef CQueueEvent< ValueType > EventType;
00159     typedef CObserver< EventType > ObserverType;
00160     typedef typename EventType::ValueList ValueList;
00161 
00162     
00166     virtual void ObserverAdded( ObserverType* );
00167 
00171     virtual void ObserverRemoved( ObserverType* );
00172 };

00200 template <typename ValueType>
00201 class CQueueObserver : public CObserver< CQueueEvent<ValueType> >
00202 {
00203 public:
00204     typedef CQueueEvent<ValueType> EventType;
00205     typedef typename CObserver< EventType >::ObservableType ObservableType;
00206     typedef typename EventType::ValueList ValueList;
00207 
00208 
00212     CQueueObserver();
00213     
00214     
00218     virtual void ReceiveNotification( const ObservableType*, const EventType& e );
00219 
00220     
00230     ValueType GetNext();
00231 
00235     size_t GetRemaining() const;
00236 
00240     bool IsActive() const;
00241 
00245     void Reset();
00246     
00247 private:
00249     mutable wxMutex m_mutex;
00250     
00251     typedef std::multiset<ValueType> Queue;
00252     typedef typename Queue::iterator QueueIterator;
00254     Queue m_queue;
00255 
00257     const ObservableType* m_owner;
00258 };

00268 template <typename ValueType>
00269 CQueueEvent<ValueType>::CQueueEvent( Type event )
00270     : m_list( NULL  ),
00271       m_value( NULL ),
00272       m_type( event )
00273 {
00274 
00275 }

00278 template <typename ValueType>
00279 CQueueEvent<ValueType>::CQueueEvent( Type event, const ValueList* list )
00280     : m_list( list  ),
00281       m_value( NULL ),
00282       m_type( event )
00283 {
00284     wxASSERT( list );
00285 }

00288 template <typename ValueType>
00289 CQueueEvent<ValueType>::CQueueEvent( Type event, const ValueType& value )
00290     : m_list( NULL  ),
00291       m_value( &value ),
00292       m_type( event )
00293 {
00294 }

00296 
00297 template <typename ValueType>
00298 size_t CQueueEvent<ValueType>::GetCount() const {
00299     if ( m_list ) {
00300         return m_list->size();
00301     } else if ( m_value ) {
00302         return 1;
00303     } else {
00304         return 0;
00305     }
00306 }
00307 
00308 
00309 template <typename ValueType>
00310 ValueType CQueueEvent<ValueType>::GetValue( size_t i ) const {
00311     if ( m_list ) {
00312         return (*m_list).at( i );
00313     } else if ( m_value && i == 0 ) {
00314         return *m_value;
00315     } else {
00316         wxFAIL;
00317         return ValueType();
00318     }
00319 }

00324 template <typename ValueType>
00325 CObservableQueue<ValueType>::~CObservableQueue()
00326 {
00327     this->RemoveAllObservers();
00328 }

00331 template <typename ValueType>
00332 void CObservableQueue<ValueType>::ObserverAdded( ObserverType* o )
00333 {
00334     NotifyObservers( EventType( EventType::STARTING ), o );
00335 }
00336 
00337 
00338 template <typename ValueType>
00339 void CObservableQueue<ValueType>::ObserverRemoved( ObserverType* o )
00340 {
00341     NotifyObservers( EventType( EventType::STOPPING ), o );
00342 }

00347 template <typename ValueType>
00348 CQueueObserver<ValueType>::CQueueObserver()
00349 {
00350     m_owner = NULL;
00351 }
00352 
00353 
00354 template <typename ValueType>
00355 void CQueueObserver<ValueType>::ReceiveNotification( const ObservableType* o, const EventType& e )
00356 {
00357     wxMutexLocker lock( m_mutex );
00358 
00359     if ( e.GetEvent() == EventType::INSERTED || e.GetEvent() == EventType::INITIAL ) {
00360         for ( size_t i = 0; i < e.GetCount(); i++ ) {
00361             m_queue.insert( e.GetValue( i ) );
00362         }
00363     } else if ( e.GetEvent() == EventType::REMOVED ) {
00364         for ( size_t i = 0; i < e.GetCount(); i++ ) {
00365             QueueIterator it = m_queue.find( e.GetValue( i ) );
00366 
00367             if ( it != m_queue.end() ) {
00368                 m_queue.erase( it );
00369             }
00370         }
00371     } else if ( e.GetEvent() == EventType::CLEARED ) {
00372         m_queue.clear();
00373     } else if ( e.GetEvent() == EventType::STOPPING ) {
00374         m_queue.clear();
00375         m_owner = NULL;
00376     } else if ( e.GetEvent() == EventType::STARTING ) {
00377         wxASSERT(m_owner == NULL);
00378         m_owner = o;
00379     } else {
00380         wxFAIL;
00381     }
00382 }
00383 
00384 
00385 template <typename ValueType>
00386 ValueType CQueueObserver<ValueType>::GetNext()
00387 {
00388     wxMutexLocker lock( m_mutex );
00389     
00390     if ( m_queue.size() ) {
00391         ValueType v = *m_queue.begin();
00392         m_queue.erase( m_queue.begin() );
00393 
00394         return v;
00395     }
00396 
00397     return ValueType();
00398 }
00399 
00400 
00401 template <typename ValueType>
00402 size_t CQueueObserver<ValueType>::GetRemaining() const
00403 {
00404     wxMutexLocker lock( m_mutex );
00405     
00406     return m_queue.size();
00407 }
00408 
00409 
00410 template <typename ValueType>
00411 bool CQueueObserver<ValueType>::IsActive() const
00412 {
00413     return (m_owner != NULL);
00414 }
00415 
00416 
00417 template <typename ValueType>
00418 void CQueueObserver<ValueType>::Reset()
00419 {
00420     ObservableType* owner;
00421     
00422     {
00423         wxMutexLocker lock(m_mutex);
00424         m_queue.clear();    
00425         owner = const_cast<ObservableType*>( m_owner );
00426     }
00427 
00428     owner->RemoveObserver( this );
00429     owner->AddObserver( this ); 
00430 }
